segments.text: Hello . I'm having a problem with my air conditioner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There's no cold air coming out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , we'll send someone up to check it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going out right now . But that's all right , you can come when I've gone .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . The housekeeper will open the door and stay in the room with the repairmen .
segments.speaker: S1
